name: Apify
description: Extract data from any website using thousands of tools from the Apify Store.
long_description: Apify is the world's largest marketplace of tools for web scraping, data extraction, and web automation. You can extract structured data from social media, e-commerce, search engines, maps, travel sites, or any other website.

apify_token.title: Apify token
apify_token.description: Your Apify API token for authentication

tools.title: Enabled tools
tools.description: Comma-separated list of tools to enable. Can be either a tool category, a specific tool, or an Apify Actor. For example: "actors,docs,apify/rag-web-browser". For more details visit https://mcp.apify.com.
